page.title: 04JOBS IN LOCAL VILLAGES
page.content: The majority of villagers in Stibbington and Ailsworth are in paid employment. There is little evidence of unemployment. There is a sizeable number of retired people in Ailsworth. Types of jobs include a good sprinkling of professional jobs as well as non-professional jobs such as lorry drivers. The residents of Stibbington tend to work in various nearby villages, whilst most Ailsworth people work in either Peterborough or Ailsworth itself. People in both villages use a car to get to work, especially those in Stibbington where a large proportion of the residents own a car. In Ailsworth more people are able to walk to work or go by public transport to get to Peterborough. Stibbington is much less well served by public transport.
